sentences.english: Indigo glazing through the last crystal glazed processing screen.
sentences.chinese: 通過靛藍上釉，最後水晶釉面處理畫面。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method to determine indigo contents in Anti-ulcer paste of traditional Chinese herbs.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立中藥潰瘍糊劑中靛藍的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Blue , is mainly used to extract from the blue grass of indigo dye.
sentences.chinese: 青色，主要是用從藍草中提取靛藍染成的。

sentences.english: Indigos and Crystals are extremely sensitive.
sentences.chinese: 靛藍和水晶都極爲敏感。

sentences.english: Advances on enhancement of permeability by transdermal drug delivery;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究青辛速釋貼中靛藍經皮滲透特性。

sentences.english: Why are ungrounded "Indigo Children" such a problem? For one, the.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼靛藍孩子是使人困惑的難題？

sentences.english: The main products of our company are indigo-dyed bobbin and knitted jean fabric collection.
sentences.chinese: 我公司主要產品爲靛藍筒子紗線和針織牛仔系列面料。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the relative content of Indirubin and Indigo of Indigowoad root from different areas.
sentences.chinese: 目的比較不同來源板藍根中靛玉紅與靛藍的相對含量。

sentences.english: Why are ungrounded "Indigo Children" such a problem?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼靛藍孩子有不接地這個問題？

sentences.english: Japanese "blue dye" and Chinese are the same, but also with indigo dyeing.
sentences.chinese: 日語的“藍染”和中文是一樣的，也是用靛藍染色。

sentences.english: Multiple dips create a deep dark indigo blue.
sentences.chinese: 多個垂度創造深黑暗的靛藍色。

sentences.english: This shirt is of indigo blue.
A great many stars were shining in the indigo blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 繁星在靛藍色的天空閃爍着。

sentences.english: Indigo shows the similar adsorbable performance to the three kinds of protein as Langmuir's.
sentences.chinese: 靛藍對三種酶蛋白的吸附和朗格繆爾吸附大致吻合。

sentences.english: "The vinegar sets the indigo and keeps it from fading, " he says.
sentences.chinese: 他說“醋可以使靛藍穩定，防止牛仔褲褪色。”

sentences.english: Denim fabric bio-washed with acidic cellulase was further treated with laccase.
sentences.chinese: 靛藍牛仔布用酸性纖維素酶洗後，進一步作漆酶處理。

definition: batik (color printing on cloth using wax)
